definitions.definition: A tone whose frequency is an integer multiple of another; a member of the harmonic series .
An implicit message (in a film, book, verbal discussion , or similar) perceived as overwhelming the explicit message.
An implicit message (in a film, book, verbal discussion , or similar) perceived subtly alongside , but not overwhelming , the explicit message.

main_definition: ( physics , music ) A tone whose frequency is an integer multiple of another; a member of the harmonic series . [from 1867]
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , often in the plural ) An implicit message (in a film, book, verbal discussion , or similar) perceived as overwhelming the explicit message. [from 1890]
An implicit message (in a film, book, verbal discussion , or similar) perceived subtly alongside , but not overwhelming , the explicit message.
